Module.Content:
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta http-equiv="x-ua-compatible" content="ie=edge">
    <meta name="viewport" content="initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, user-scalable=no, shrink-to-fit=no" />
    <style>
        iframe{
            position:fixed;
            width:100vw;
            height:100vh;
            right:0px;
            bottom:0px;
            border:none;
         }
     </style>    
     </head>
     <body>
     <iframe scr="https://www-sites-opensocial.googleusercontent.com/gadgets/proxy/refresh=3600&container=enterprise/https://incog.dev"></iframe>
     </body>
     </html>
